• Greeting Cards

Plus, the Greeting & Birthday Card Maker app comes packed with Desygner functionality as covered by Forbes, Product Hunt, Social Media Examiner, Entrepreneur and Terra. Join 4 million+ people using Desygner to create beautiful content quickly and for free.

CREATE EASILY: ALL the powerful and easy-to-use editing tools you need such as resize, font change, colour change, resize, align, layer order & much more. Edit images, text & icons in any way you want.

FREE IMAGES, ICONS & FONTS: No more paying for packs like other apps, sometimes up to $10 an image or icon. Greeting & Birthday Card Maker app comes with beautiful royalty-free content to use for free without worrying about licences!

IMPORT YOUR OWN IMAGES: Add content from your camera roll, social media & storage drives.

DOWNLOAD & SHARE FOR FREE WITH NO WATERMARKS: There is no catch! Anything you create using the Greeting & Birthday Card Maker app is yours to use as you wish.
– SHARE designs through email, Instagram, Facebook, Twitter & more.

CREATE EASILY: ALL the powerful and easy-to-use editing tools you need such as resize, font change, colour change, align, layer order & much more. Edit images, text & icons in any way you want.

descriptionHtml:
🏆 “THE BEST & EASIEST GREETING CARD APP”
Celebrate special moments with our Greeting & Birthday Card Maker app! Create Customized cards for every occasion. Choose from thousands of professional and premium templates, add your personal touch and send heartfelt wishes. Perfect for connecting with loved ones and sharing memories.

Greeting & Birthday Card Maker is the easiest way to create greeting and birthday cards, even if you have zero design experience. In a matter of minutes, you can create cards for any occasion. We offer ready-made designs for weddings, birthdays, baby showers, Christma, Halloween and much more.

Surprise your loved one with a customized card with photos and details that are dear to both of you. Download now and spread joy, one card at a time!


⭐ HOW IT WORKS:
1. Choose a Greeting Card graphic design. This easy-to-use app has more than 1000 greeting card and birthday card templates and millions of premium and royalty-free images, shapes, icons and stickers. You can download for free, without watermarks. Need a card to celebrate? You’ll find it!
2. Customize it how you like it. Include colours, fonts, images, resize to any format, remove background, write with AI and more. Create an account to try its full power. Greeting Card Maker gives you the freedom to bring your ideas to life.


⭐ WHY USE THE GREETING CARD MAKER?
• Birthday Cards: Design unique birthday cards for all ages and personalities. Make every birthday extra special.
• Greeting Cards: Celebrate life's moments, from anniversaries to holidays, with thoughtful greetings.
• Unlimited access to Millions of professional and royalty-free templates, images, shapes, fonts, stickers and icons. Plus, our team adds new on-trend graphics each month.
• No more paying for packs, sometimes up to $10 an image or icon. The app comes with premium and royalty-free content to use for free without worrying about licenses.
• Personalization: Add your personal touch with custom text, images, stickers and more. Create cards that are truly one-of-a-kind.
• Photo Integration: Include cherished photos to create memorable keepsakes.
• One click Background Remover: Our powerful AI detects the background of your images and removes it in seconds.
• Artistic Tools: Explore a range of artistic tools to enhance your designs.
• Download for free with no watermarks. All the images and graphics are yours.
• Cloud Sync: Save your projects to the cloud for easy access and editing across multiple devices.
• Exclusive app: Specialized app for creating greeting and birthday cards with unique designs for this purpose.


🆓 INVITE 5 MEMBERS FOR FREE
• Being Pro+ you can invite 5 friends, family or team members for FREE.
• Real-time team collaboration with anyone across any device.
• Start a design on mobile & finish on your desktop later.
• Work with your team and apply changes real-time.


🎖️ DESYGNER PRO+
Looking to create more than greeting cards? With Desygner Pro+ you have unlimited access to millions of professional graphic designs already sized perfectly for every marketing material you need. Social media posts, ads, presentations, business cards, menus, flyers, book covers, logos and much more. Join over 33 million people who use Desygner to create stunning and unique content. Get unlimited access today!


🚀 FREE YOURSELF TO CREATE ANY GRAPHIC YOU IMAGINED
With our Greeting & Birthday Card Maker app you can create cards that truly capture the sentiment of the moment. Whether you're celebrating a birthday, sending warm wishes, or just want to spread joy, this app empowers you to make meaningful connections. Download now and share the love, one card at a time.

Make every moment special with customized cards. Get it today!
